channel.title: Zdiddy Reloaded
channel.description:
I HAVE NO OWNER SHIP OF THIS WHATSOEVER.
100% CREDITS TO : zoltanman
Okay, so people have been requesting from me that i put up a download link for this server, it is called zdiddy-reloaded, use to be a very popular source, had tons of players, and everything works...
Server Features: -100% combat system. -100% custom trading area (cannot trade unless your in it.) -has all godswords. -dragon defender. -im including the masterbank (did not come with the original release) -has a f2p zone for f2p pkers. -has a p2p zone for p2p pkers. -godsword mini-game -slayer tower is the base, has many shops. -Portal room
- kbd -Jad area (he drops firecapes rare) -And Much Much More, but i dont feel like going into too much detail because i know people are going to flame this.
[IMG]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/4675/14321970.png[/img] [IMG]http://img227.imageshack.us/img227/6298/41762121.png[/img] [IMG]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/38/23470031.png[/img] [IMG]http://img574.imageshack.us/img574/951/37425695.png[/img] [IMG]http://img824.imageshack.us/img824/1325/17420292.png[/img] [IMG]http://img709.imageshack.us/img709/6664/90679854.png[/img] [IMG]http://img258.imageshack.us/img258/2835/66498479.png[/img] [/IMG] http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/1847/12560479.png[/IMG] [IMG]http://img826.imageshack.us/img826/574/17253971.png[/img] [IMG]http://img200.imageshack.us/img200/7600/51140296.png[/img] [IMG]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/2587/87286331.png[/img]
EDIT: THIS IS NOT MINE, I DIDNT NOT LEECH IT, IM JUST RELEASING IT BECAUSE ITS IMPOSSIBLE TO FIND ANYMORE.
Download is a package, (i added a stress releiver to it for when players piss you off.)
Heres the link (package): http://uppit.com/bu4osmo2wzxl/zdiddyreload_server.rar
Feel free to Leave A Comment. Just Don't Flame, Kthxbai

[quote=“s 3 3 m 3, post:18, topic:369976”]Yea dude i bet it was fun :D, it was also fun to play. Rumors were goin around that you quit hosting.

But i gotta give it to ya, it was a success.[/quote]

I quit hosting it because it got hacked and released. So there was no reason to run it anymore.

Yea, anybody know who the original owner is? So I could post him credits or something.

It was mine.
[/quote]

Alright credits added. And Nicely done, this server was epic.[/quote]
